project_descr: Carry out Energy efficiency baseline study and to come up with relevant policy measures

outputs.output_descr:
Baseline study for Energy Efficiency strategy and policy-recommendations for key sectors (buildings, transport, agriculture, industry) developed through stakeholder consultations
Formulation of National Energy Efficiency Policy
Improved knowledge, awareness and capacities of policy makers, promoters and investors

project_title: energy efficiency baseline study & policy support
